channel.title: klavaro on budRich.github.io - Boiling rice in coffe

item.title: preferences
item.description: Klavaro is a GTK touch typing trainer. It is really nice to just sit and listen to a pod while the fingers flow. My average WPM is around 60 at the moment. But I slowly improve. klavarosolarized.png I believe touch typing is very important to master if you want to become a good programmer. If you never have given touch typing a thought, i really recommend you read Programming’s Dirtiest Little Secret by Steve Yegge.
